pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot Positive and Negative Predictive Values for Medical Tests // Functions to plot and help understand positive and negative predictive values (PPV and NPV), and their relationship with sensitivity, specificity, and prevalence. See Akobeng, A.K. (2007) doi:10.1111/j.1651-2227.2006.00180.x for a theoretical overview of the technical concepts and Navarrete et al. (2015) for a practical explanation about the importance of their understanding doi:10.3389/fpsyg.2015.01327.
